document.docAuthor: Nagata, Renato Mitsuo, Júnior, Miodeli Nogueira & Haddad, Maria Angélica
document.masterDocTitle: Faunistic survey of Hydromedusae (Cnidaria, Medusozoa) from the coast of Paraná State, Southern Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Faunistic survey of Hydromedusae (Cnidaria, Medusozoa) from the coast of Paraná State, Southern Brazil

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 27–32.
Olindias sambaquiensis Müller
: adult medusae in oral view (27) , umbrellar margin with primary tentacles inserted on exumbrela, and secondary tentacles and club-shaped protrusions originating on umbrellar margin (28) ; mouth (29) and gonads with papilliform processes (30) ;
Cunina octonaria McCrady
: adult medusae (31) and marginal lobe with otoporpae (arrows) (32) .

subSubSection.paragraph: Reference specimens: MZUSP 900, 10 specimens . Dzoo-Cn 215, 2 specimens ; Dzoo-Cn 198, 8 specimens .

Distribution in Brazil .
From north of the State of Rio de Janeiro (A.C. Morandini pers. comm. 2012 ) to Santa Catarina (
Nogueira et al. 2010
).
